DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect home exercise program , supervise assistant nurse aim prevent fall . Community live person 65 year age old risk fall invited participate . Participants randomize either train control . The training program individually design physiotherapist 5-month program performance supervise partcipants home eight home visit assistant nurse . DOC.brief_title: Fall Prevention Among Community Living Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: Falls among elderly major public health problem , preventive intervention contain physical exercise home improvement available . In study crucial question test whether unlicensed staff , assistant nurse , could use preventive work . Estimation study power give 170 participant group would need detect difference day fall , main outcome measure .
